snippet: As many as 4.8 million people could be affected by expiring benefits through 2014, and there is little sign that Congress will act before it adjourns in two weeks.
abstract: Estimated 1.3 million people are set to lose access to emergency program providing them with additional weeks of jobless benefits unless Congress acts during last week of December; as many as 4.8 million people could be affected by expiring benefits through 2014, with little sign of progress by Congress.
lead_paragraph: As many as 4.8 million people could be affected by expiring benefits through 2014, and there is little sign that Congress will act before it adjourns in two weeks.

headline.main: Extension of Benefits for Jobless Is Set to End
headline.print_headline: Extension of Benefits For Jobless Is Set to End
